title: cogentjm
author: cogentjm
created_time: May 07, 2022, 02:15:36 PMLast edit: May 20, 2022, 10:19:14 AM by cogentjm
content: Hi, BitcoinTalk!We'd like to get you to learn about HEXROAST project! HEXROAST is an upcoming NFT game based on play-to-earn principle. Become the strongest player and earn money with just your skill. Join us and have fun! UPD: 20/05/2022We'd like to officially launch our airdrop campaign!Follow 5 simple actions to get coins for free.We will distribute 500,000 coins of the project among all airdprop participants. The issue of coins will take place on June 15.Read more about the distribution conditions here.

comments.author: moprobz
comments.body: Nice! It's much more interesting than farm NFT games

comments.author: .shdvb.
comments.body: This is not the only NFT game with real action gameplay. But I like this project, I will wait for more information about it.

comments.author: moprobz
comments.body: Quote from: .shdvb. on May 13, 2022, 05:37:04 PMThis is not the only NFT game with real action gameplay. But I like this project, I will wait for more information about it.Let's be honest, most of the P2P games are absolutely trivial farms. I am glad to see another game with an interesting and REAL gameplay. But I agree, we will wait for the news of the project

comments.author: abcdefgxyzabc
comments.body: Excellent tokenomics! Tell us more about the oracle system

comments.author: Miiike
comments.body: Your allocation for team and partners are very interesting, each of them got 25% and 20%, locked for 6 months, with gradual unlock of 5% every month. Did my math get rusty or a project who tried to sell their products turns to be very bad at math?

comments.author: abcdefgxyzabc
comments.body: I think 25 percent is the team's coin share of all coins. For 6 months, their coins are unlocked at 5 percent, after which all other coins are unlocked. But I don't know for sure, we need to wait for the project's response

comments.author: Dopeyo
comments.body: Quote from: abcdefgxyzabc on May 14, 2022, 07:59:26 PMI think 25 percent is the team's coin share of all coins. For 6 months, their coins are unlocked at 5 percent, after which all other coins are unlocked. But I don't know for sure, we need to wait for the project's responseI don't think the project has messed up with the economy.  We will wait for an official response. Sounds like an explanation.

comments.author: sendmestuff
comments.body: interesting project! Do you have a gameplay video?

comments.author: cogentjm
comments.body: Quote from: sendmestuff on May 14, 2022, 08:56:34 PMinteresting project! Do you have a gameplay video?Hello! We will post it very soon, follow the news of the project

comments.author: cogentjm
comments.body: Quote from: cogentjm on May 15, 2022, 07:39:46 PMQuote from: sendmestuff on May 14, 2022, 08:56:34 PMinteresting project! Do you have a gameplay video?Hello! We will post it very soon, follow the news of the project Hello! Thanks for the question. You and the project are doing well with math  "6 months locked" means that the coins are unavailable. "5% monthly unlockc" means that the team unlocks all tokens in 20 months.  We will take your question into account and will work out the design of tokenomics in more detail

comments.author: cogentjm
comments.body: Quote from: abcdefgxyzabc on May 13, 2022, 07:45:12 PMExcellent tokenomics! Tell us more about the oracle systemHello! You can learn more about the oracle system in our whitepaper and social networks.

comments.author: cogentjm
comments.body: Quote from: moprobz on May 13, 2022, 04:49:09 PMNice! It's much more interesting than farm NFT games Thank you for your feedback! Yes, we strive to create a P2E game with an interesting and diverse gameplay.

comments.author: cogentjm
comments.body: Quote from: .shdvb. on May 13, 2022, 05:37:04 PMThis is not the only NFT game with real action gameplay. But I like this project, I will wait for more information about it.Yes, we know about our competitors. However, we create a unique product and strive to firmly occupy our niche

comments.author: Dopeyo
comments.body: One more question. Are you planning to launch an airdprop? When will the first presales be held?

comments.author: cogentjm
comments.body: Quote from: Dopeyo on May 16, 2022, 10:44:39 PMOne more question. Are you planning to launch an airdprop? When will the first presales be held?Hello! We have published a video with the gameplay on our social networks. Yes, we are planning to launch airdprop. The first presales will be announced after we reach the required number of subscribers in the telegram channel. The team is now actively working on promoting the project.

When will the first presales be held?Hello! We have published a video with the gameplay on our social networks. Yes, we are planning to launch airdprop. But I didn't see in the video how the shop works. It has a separate interface, how will the game mechanics affect the balance?
